summary: Changes To the Fall damage formula for Both The Player And NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the fall damage for all actors ingame.
The maximum distance you can jump without taking damage is about 14 feet or so, 
far more realistic then the near 30 feet that Vanilla skyrim has.
Also changes the scale of damage you take, a fall from high enough will basically
kill just about anybody. Usually unless you roll into a fall, you\'re breaking your legs.
Which means you\'re basically dead anyways.

Uninstallation is pretty simple, just disable the esp
Endorse if you like the changes, and leave any comments about things I could improve.
Thanks :3
Example first shows vanilla, then with my mod activated.
[youtube]GX1mGZhFdVI[/youtube]
author: AlkaSetzer
